Luna:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
Luna:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

Luna:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
Luna:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
Luna:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

Luna:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
Luna:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

Luna:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
Luna:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !Luna:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

Luna:LunaSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
Luna:LunaSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !Luna:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

Luna:SlashCard.NAME: Stance: Slash
Luna:SlashCard.DESCRIPTION: Change your stance into Slash then deal !D! Damage.

Luna:EngardeCard.NAME: Stance: Engarde
Luna:EngardeCard.DESCRIPTION: Change your stance into Engarde then gain !M! Block.

Luna:Adaptive.NAME: Adaptive Stance
Luna:Adaptive.DESCRIPTION: Change your stance into either Engarde or Slash for !M!
Luna:Adaptive.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Change your stance into either Engarde, Slash or Parry for !M!
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Select a Stance to Change into:
change your stance into Slash for !M!
change your stance into Engarde for !M!
change your stance into Parry for !M!
